title: Projects
text:
Below are selected examples of my academic, consulting, and entrepreneurial work. Each one reflects a different aspect of my strategic thinking and creative problem solving.



Course: AI in Business ‚Äì UCW, 2025
Tools: ChatGPT, Canva, APA Style, Quarto
Developed a campaign strategy for Netflix using LLM tools to generate initial drafts, refine message framing, and structure a full business report. The project included target analysis, risk assessment, and visual design alignment.




Course: Consulting Practices ‚Äì UCW, 2025
Role: Team Facilitator, Moderator, and Note-Taker
Worked with a real BC startup to analyze the company‚Äôs market position and provide strategic advice. Delivered a SWOT analysis, partnership suggestions, and identified core challenges using live team collaboration and business diagnostic frameworks.




Role: Co-Founder & Strategy Consultant
Focus: Helping small business owners in BC make strategic decisions affordably.
Developed service models like ‚ÄúGhost Buyer‚Äù and ‚ÄúDiagnostic Express.‚Äù Designed pricing structure, marketing strategies, and business health reports. Focused on real-world, accessible consulting with ethical use of AI tools.




Project: Honors Thesis ‚Äì Universidad Iberoamericana
Title: Human-Centered Urban Strategies
Explored how people experience public spaces in Mexico City and proposed a design methodology to improve the relationship between community, movement, and scale. Received honors upon graduation.

title: Viviana Ugalde
text:
About Me
Business Consultant, Architect & Urban Designer
‚ÄúMy passion is designing business strategies beyond building drawings.‚Äù
I began my career designing human-centered architecture and urban spaces. After more than a decade in real estate consulting and entrepreneurship, I moved to Vancouver to pursue an MBA and shift my focus to business strategy.
Now, I help shape ideas, build consulting models, and support small businesses as they grow. I co-founded BusinessBear, a consulting firm in British Columbia focused on empowering local entrepreneurs. My goal is to blend creativity with clarity‚Äîto reimagine business as a space for transformation.
This portfolio shares my experience, tools, and real-world projects where AI, consulting, and human insight come together.
